headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google.com https://*.openstreetmap.org https://*.tile.openstreetmap.org https://order.kangpajak.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.openstreetmap.org https://*.kangpajak.com https://nominatim.openstreetmap.org; frame-src 'self';
